data.1: OF WHAT ARE they asking one another?
data.3: About which they have been differing?
data.4: Indeed they will come to know soon;
data.5: They will indeed come to know soon.
data.6: Did We not make the earth a spreading,
data.9: And made sleep for you to rest,
data.11: And the day for seeking livelihood.
data.12: We raised over you several secure (skies),
data.13: And placed a lamp therein brightly burning.
data.14: And We sent down rain from water-laden clouds pouring in torrents
data.15: That We may produce from it grain and vegetation,
data.16: And orchards full of trees and interlacing boughs.
data.17: Surely a time is fixed for the Day of Judgement.
data.18: The day the trumpet blast is sounded you will come in hordes;
data.19: The heavens will be opened wide and turn into so many doors,
data.20: The mountains put in motion turning into a mirage.
data.23: Where they will remain for aeons,
data.24: Finding neither sleep nor any thing to drink
data.25: Except boiling water and benumbing cold:
data.27: They were those who did not expect a reckoning,
data.28: And rejected Our signs as lies.
data.29: We have kept account of everything in a book.
data.30: So taste (the fruit of what you sowed), for We shall add nothing but torment,
data.31: As for those who preserve themselves from evil and follow the straight path, there is attainment for them:
data.33: And graceful maidens of the same age,
data.35: They will hear no blasphemies there or disavowals:
data.36: A recompense from your Lord, a sufficient gift,
data.37: The Lord of the heavens and the earth, and all that lies between them, most benevolent, to whom none may dare address a word.
data.38: The day the Spirit takes its stand, with the angels ranged in rows. None will speak except who is permitted by Ar-Rahman and says what is right.
data.39: That day is certain. So whosoever likes may prepare a way to his Lord.
data.40: We have indeed warned you of a calamity near at hand, a day when man will see what he had sent (of his deeds) ahead, and the unbeliever will say: "Woe alas. Ah would that I were dust!"
